reviews.name: The game
reviews.title: The game
reviews.text: If you aren’t in a team you get trash randoms so brawl stars is team up to win. Also I have 16556 trophies and no legendary brawlers and brawl boxes clearly state that for every box you don’t get a brawler your chances of getting a brawler increase I have 25 other brawlers that are not trophy Road.

reviews.name: A great game that is so easy to learn
reviews.title: A great game that is so easy to learn
reviews.text: Brawl stars is such a fun game that really anybody can play. The thing that I like the best is every season you get a new brawler if you get gems from the last season for 170 gems. But the only thing is that there is suff in the shop that you can by for gems and you just have to not get those things and you be fine. I really suggest you getting brawl stars because it is only hard to master by easy to play.

reviews.name: This game is awesome
reviews.title: This game is awesome
reviews.text: Nothing is wrong with the game at all I even got my dad and my sister to play it me and my sister has spent a little bit money on the game no regrets keep up the good work supercell

reviews.name: Amazing game
reviews.title: Amazing game
reviews.text: Hi brawl stars,I am just writing to say how much I love your game I also love the 25 days of Christmas rewards if you check I haven’t been online in a while because of problems in real life it is though right now but I log back in to a big surprise all the rewards from the championship event. I wasn’t able to login in it for the championship because it wasn’t t working I was kind of bummed but then you guys gave me the rewards this made me so happy and on top of that all the pins I missed In the 25 days of Christmas I will continue playing this game and I am about to spend money on it because I love it so much I am free to play so far but your games too good for me to pass up the great New Years ever offers. I have been playing for almost 3-4 years.Thank you so much Keep up your amazing work

reviews.name: The games good but...
reviews.title: The games good but...
reviews.text: I’m starting to notice this game is now a profit a pay to win I have been playing for three years have not spent a dime on this game but I have never gotten a legendary character now with the brawl pass people can get stuff very easily and now this game has turned into a complete pay to win although i do miss the old brawl stars the game is very fun I don’t find any bugs and such and when I’m not scared of playing the game I do
